plot outline: The film shows how even serious issues can be resolved in a light-hearted manner. Life throws up several challenges and some of them turn out to be insurmountable. Sometimes, in trying to solve these, we cause more problems to crop up. The directpr has presented this idea in a humorous way, and the whole film is loaded with hilarious situations, even though the problems being talked about are serious.
